pages.text: $(o)Let me be honest here, reader, I'm somewhat frustrated by these golden threads. They're slippery, so much so that they slide out of knots. Weaving with them seems like a lost cause...$(p)They don't even seem to react in a Crucible, so, what, are they just useless??

$(o)No, no, let me collect myself. A material as reactive as Gold, refined by alchemy, then by fire... they must have some use. Perhaps -- well, Gold Symbols help with $(thing)Reactions$(0), right? Maybe these could also affect a running Reaction?
